tests/auth.setup.js.description: Auth test supports DEMO MODE (USE_DEMO_MODE=true) and REAL MODE. Demo mode navigates to /demo-app directly, Real mode performs login with credentials. Existing auth state in .auth/user.json indicates previous successful authentication.

tests/e2e-journeys/cpu-standby-failover..description: Contains 11 E2E tests in 3 suites: CPU Standby Failover (4 tests), Metrics (2 tests), Failover Report (5 tests). Tests use flexible Playwright patterns with .first(), .catch(() => false), and force clicks. Some tests have weak assertions that always pass.
